name: Sleep Rider
description:
You've fallen asleep snowboarding. How could this have happened? Hopefully, your astral projection will steer you away from harm.

Sleep Rider is a snowboarding game where the rider has an out-of-body experience when crashing. This can also be forced using the interact key ("F" on a keyboard, "Y" on an xbox controller) as the rider. As the projection, you can interact with other things in the environment. Clear debris, straighten up the rider before a crash, or prop the rider back up after a crash.

This project is an entry for the 48hr GMTK Game Jam 2020, themed "Out of Control"
